hi guys iv added this code in my server

} public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ dan cwars", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); sendFrame126("@cya@ killcount: " + killcount, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

and iv added this

[code] public boolean process() { specialRestoreTimer -= 1; // is being called regularily every 500ms

writePlayers()[/code]

and compiled every thing ok right BUT…

when i run my server log in and the text keeps flashes whats rong please help…
